backend/main.mo: Main ICP actor defining user profile and inquiry data models with CRUD operations, enforcing role-based access control via AccessControl and MixinAuthorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the EnrollmentSection component displays the athletes@velocityhealthclinic.com email address prominently on the inquiry form.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of all frontend source files to short summaries, serving as a quick reference for each component and hook in the project.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell with a root div and module script entry point for the Velocity Prime React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that composes all page sections (Navigation, Hero through Footer) in order for the single-page Velocity Prime marketing site.
frontend/src/components/DiagnosticsSecti: Renders a grid of eight diagnostic test cards with badge labels and descriptions, plus a feature image and highlighted CCTA cardiac readiness entry.
frontend/src/components/EnrollmentSectio: Enrollment inquiry form with validation, wearable device select, and backend submission via useSubmitInquiry; includes a success state and a mailto callout for athletes@velocityhealthclinic.com.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: Renders eight FAQ entries as a collapsible shadcn/ui Accordion with questions and answers about the Velocity Prime program.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with the Velocity Prime logo, smooth-scroll nav links, copyright year, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Full-screen hero section with a background image, brand headline, tagline, CTA buttons to scroll to apply/program sections, and a stats strip showing key program numbers.
frontend/src/components/MonitoringSectio: Displays an 8-card grid of monitored health areas (sleep, nutrients, hormones, etc.) with icons and descriptions, under a 'What We're Watching For' heading.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar with scroll-aware background, smooth-scroll desktop nav links, an Apply CTA button, and a collapsible mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Pricing section displaying a single $12,000 6-month program card with a full inclusions checklist, pharmacy cost disclaimer, and an Apply CTA button.
frontend/src/components/ProblemSection.t: Section outlining six common athlete health problems (overtraining, deficiencies, poor sleep, etc.) in a card grid, followed by a callout positioning Velocity Prime as the solution.
Renders a 6-month program timeline section with 5 alternating left/right steps displayed over a dark overlay background image.
frontend/src/components/ValueProposition: Displays a three-pillar value proposition section (Baseline, Monitoring, Intervention) with icons and descriptions on a dark background.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, and identity persistence across page reloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports a `useSubmitInquiry` mutation hook that submits a contact/inquiry form via the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Barlow fonts, configures Tailwind, and defines dark-first OKLCH CSS custom properties for the design system along with utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the Velocity Prime frontend, extending the default theme with custom brand colors (oklch-based VP tokens, amber glow shadows), Barlow fonts, border radii, keyframe animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall Velocity Prime project state including version, architectural notes, known issues, and a detailed registry of existing and planned features with their requirement IDs and implementation versions.
